refnamediv.refpurpose: Gamma parameter estimates with method of moments

listitem.para: a matrix of doubles, the data, data>=0.
a 1-by-2 matrix of doubles, the parameters of the Gamma distribution. parmhat(1) is a, parmhat(2) is b.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Estimates the parameters of the Gamma distribution with method of moments. In other words, finds the parameters so that the mean and variance of the distribution are equal to the empirical mean and empirical variance of the data.
The implementation is based on direct inversion of the moments.

refsection.title: Examples
